Kenosha Elevator Out Of Service
The Kenosha Elevator is out of service. Customers can use Winthrop Harbor as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-W -  Geneva Platform 2 Rehabilitation

On Monday, October 9, the Geneva outbound platform (Platform 2) will be closed for rehabilitation through the end of 2024. Commuters must use the temporary platform located east of Third Street. All trains will board passengers from the rear cars on this platform. Please allow additional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 147th St./Sibley Blvd station closed for reconstruction until late summer 2024

The 147th street/Sibley Blvd station is closed for reconstruction until late summer 2024. During this time, trains will not stop at this station. As alternates, please use the nearby Ivanhoe or Harvey stations. Updates will be provided once the rehabiliation is complete and the station is accessible. Metra apologizes for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-W -  Union Pacific West Third Main Line Project.

Union Pacific announced the Route 31 underpass in Geneva will be shut down for approximately four months starting Monday, March 4, as part of the rail company’s Third Main Line project. The official detour route will direct motorists/trucks heading north on Route 31 in Batavia to turn east on Fabyan Parkway, north on Route 25 and west on Route 64 in St. Charles. The detour will be vice versa for drivers traveling south on Route 31.  Local traffic can use Third Street in Geneva, but drivers should be alert for pedestrians crossing the road throughout the downtown. For more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Homewood Platform Elevator - Out Of Service
The Homewood Platform elevator is out of service until further notice. Alternative accessible locations are the Flossmoor station and Calumet station.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-W - MDW Wood Dale Platform 2 Construction Notice Update

Beginning Thursday, May 23, 2024, after the morning rush hour, crews will start working on the last phase of the Wood Dale station platform renewal on the Milwaukee West line.  The west end of Platform #2 and associated crosswalks will be opened.  The east end of Platform #2 and associated crosswalks will be closed. The work is expected to be completed by the end of June 2024.  Please allow additional time to access the in-service platforms and exercise caution near the work zones

Metra Alert ME - Millennium Station elevator out of service until further notice
The Millennium Station elevator is out of service until further notice.  Customers can use the elevator located at 205 N Michigan, which leads to the South Water entrance to Millennium Station
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-N - Track Construction Saturday, June 29 through Sunday, June 30

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, June 29 through Sunday, June 30. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-NW - Track Construction on Saturday, June 29

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, June 29. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.

Metra Alert MD-W - Track Construction Saturday, June 29 through Sunday, June 30

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, June 29 through Sunday, June 30. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-W - River Forest Platform 2 Rehabilitation

Beginning Wednesday, May 8, the east half of Platform 2 (island platform) will be closed for rehabilitation. Once completed, the work will move to the west half of Platform 2 to complete the project by the end of November.

Please allow additional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.

Metra Alert BNSF - Track Construction Saturday, June 29 through Sunday, June 30

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, June 29 through Sunday, June 30. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.

Metra Alert UP-W - Union Pacific West - Chicago Pride Parade Additional Service, Sunday, June 30

UPDATE: Union Pacific Railroad has postponed construction work originally scheduled on the UP-West Line Sunday, June 30 until later this summer. Metra will add trains on the UP-West Line to accommodate passengers planning to attend Chicago's 53rd Annual Pride Parade. Click here for schedule information.

Metra Alert UP-N - Union Pacific North - Chicago Pride Parade Additional Service, Sunday, June 30
Metra will add trains on the Union Pacific North line to accommodate passengers planning to attend Chicago's 53rd Annual Pride Parade Sunday, June 30. Click here for schedule information.
